wikipedia_page.main: Louis John Copp Ford (18 May 1914 – 20 September 1980) was a Welsh professional footballer. He made 41 appearances for Cardiff City in all competitions before his career was ended following the outbreak of World War II.

response: * Louis Ford (born 1845), English businessman, football administrator and referee
Louis Ford (born 1845 in West Bromwich) was a businessman, football administrator and football referee.
